title: Font Suggestion: Replacement for Serifa
content:
Hi folks,

I'm looking to find a suitable replacement for Serifa. I'm using the heaviest weight. (Serifa 75 Black)  
I really like the typeface, but unfortunately I have a client that's hung up on "the heavy handed serifs"

Any suggestions on a typeface that I could use instead?

Thanks!
author: JonathanHerman

comments.content:
What’s heavy handed serifs? Is that heavy but not slab?  
There are many slab-serifs I like better than Serifa.  
Ceacilia?

Benton BQ is pretty Serifa-like, but i think it has a shorter x-height. But for something really different, you might take a look a Breughel...  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/breughel/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140510040900/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/breughel/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/breughel/")

Not seeing the Serifa on that site, Jonathan.

So are you looking for another slab (any heavy slab will have heavy serifs) or a heavy typeface from another category?
